document_data.name: Hosark
document_data.mainbody: '''Hosark''' was an [[elf]] woodsman of the [[High Forest]] in the late 13{{th}} and early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Hosark raised [[Travis Deepdell]] after the [[half-elf]] was abandoned as a baby outside his cottage some time around [[1298 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He was the owner and namesake of the magical ''[[Bow of Hosark]]''. He wore ''+2 [[elven chainmail]]''.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1338 DR]], Hosark left his bow and his armor to Travis before he went west to [[Evermeet]]. Not knowing either Hosark's or the bow's stories, Travis simply named it the ''Bow of Hosark'' in honor of his mentor.
